testcase.name: CreatePage scenario
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in "Mozilla".......................................................passed Then "createPageLink" element should be present...............................................passed And I click on "createPageLink".......................................................passed And I enter "PageHeading" as "This is confluence product test".......................................passed And I click on "saveButton".........................................................passed Then "PageTitle" should be "This is confluence product test"........................................passed

testcase.name: Put page restrictions scenario
testcase.system-out: And I click on "***Menu"..........................................................passed And I click on "RestrictionsMenuOption"...................................................passed Then "RestrictionsMenuArrowButton" element should be present........................................passed And I select "EditingRestrictionsMenuOption"................................................passed And I click on "applyButton"........................................................passed Then "EditingrestrictionsImage" element should be present..........................................passed
